Articles.Content:
I recently made a thread called the Sputnik Challenge, where you need to build an R7 replica and deliver a Sputnik to orbit.

I have a new challenge.

Build a stock N1 replica using no DLC parts (with the correct number of engines and stages, of course), transport it to the Baikerbanur Cosmodrome, launch it to the Mun. Try to make the mission as realistic as possible, in both appearance and function. Good luck!
I like this. Might try it later. But i would like to ask if i can please use tweekscale?
Ik heb er een. Echter kan ik met de originele onderdelen erg lastig de juiste tank vorm krijgen.
Okay. I built my own replica a while back, it had an abysmal part count and it didn't look much like the real thing. I bet you'll do better.
